        port - Initialized port to be added to block.
        formula - Formulas for calculating data on port connected.

      • addPort

        public void addPort(Port port,
                    java.lang.String innerId)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds Port with type In.
        Parameters:
        port - Initialized port.
        innerId - Inner Id of port, by which formulas on Out Ports can use data from it.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If variable name for port is used.
